summary: This Gem is a bundle of components that are used in the GenAIFramework Gem to communicate with AI services using AWS Bedrock services.
requirements: This Gem requires the GenAIFramework, AWS SDK that supports Bedrock Runtime and the GenAIVendorBundle Gem.
